entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:29 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
